title: Received 10 Game Chat Restriction - When joining game, says I'm banned instead?
body:
Hi all... I just got a '10 Game Chat Restriction' for being toxic. I was flaming 2 people who troll picked champs and intentionally fed. I got quite angry that I had to waste at least 20 min in game with idiots and there's nothing I could do.

Now I understand 10 Game Chat Restriction means I can still play games with no chat... but when I click 5vs5 Solo, a message pops up saying,

"Banned from League of Legends - You can't enter queue because you are currently banned from playing".

Please see the screenshots of my screen. Anyone know if this is an error? Should it say I'm banned at the main screen? How am I supposed to know how long my ban is?

Thanks...

[](http://imgur.com/TcNxE1P)

replies.body:
I feel you man lol, try just muting them or just ignoring them next time not worth, Trust me i know from experience. The moment they say something negative ignore them and just put this face  " : ^) " It will make you laugh then it will make you upset Someone says 
Troll: " Kys you cunt " 
You : " : ^) Same "
xD

I always tell myself I'll turn off chat, but my issue is - I need to communicate with the team - especially players who actually want to win lol... I always fall into the trap of fighting with trolls. It's a stupid reporting system. If I get abused by 2 players, and I respond back with abuse defending myself - the two of the report me vs me reporting each of them once.

FML... Please Riot - halp.

Please stop playing victim. It's fuckin' pathetic.

I'm toxic. You're toxic. We're all toxic. Some get punished, Some don't. Quit bitching. Take your medicine and be on your way.

It's a flaw in riot's system, that's why it's easy for pre mades to abuse the solo player. there are 2 types of pre mades. Those who are silent and communicate well and those who are toxic and talk too much. You can tell which pre made you have by the 10 min mark. If you see that you have to bottom end just mute them, sure you loose info but half the time they will be all chat talking about someone else mother anyways. Thats how i do it.

Are you attempting to join Ranked? I remember that sometimes if you trolled then you'd be banned from Ranked for a period.

Try normals or ARAM.

Hey summoner,

I think the best course of action here would be to contact [Riot Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and ask them which of these was your actual punishment. I think this was a bug with the 15 minute delay between punishments, but I'm not sure.

Feel free to check back here if you run into any problems :D

Hey Tele,

I submitted one a few hours ago and received an email saying there will be a delay in responding due to high number of tickets etc...

I swear, the only reason I get pee'd off is because of trolls... fml

Yeah that message is normal. I've noticed there always seems to be a delay of around 1 - 3 days on tickets. Hopefully you're not actually perma-banned and we still have time to reform. 

If you need any help with improving your behaviour give us a shout! It's what we do best :D
maybe you got hit with 2 punishments at the same time and only 1 is showing?
Dunno man, I thought an actual ban or suspension would show up first :/ It's quite odd...
